text:
Over the years, Itaú has been working
to improve its products and services.
We have a legacy platform
that works for Business Intelligence,
for creating dashboards.
That platform came with a series of problems,
as it was inside our on-premises data center,
it had limited scalability.
Given that scenario, we did an assessment
of the possibility of migrating to the cloud,

and we understand that Amazon QuickSight
provided us with a good service.
It is well suited to our needs
because it has this high scalability capability.
Because it’s integrated into our architecture

the security layer has become much
easier to implement.

When we started
 the journey in the old environment,

we had 32,000 users there,
 about 17,000 dashboards.
Now, after the migration,
we have added about 9,000 dashboards.

Which is interesting
because it shows how easy

it is to create and quick
 to adopt and escalate.
For instance,

we have testimonials in the
bank that QuickSight is ten times
as fast as the platform that we had before.

Which makes us happy
 because it was

a correct decision to adopt
 QuickSight and migrate to the cloud.
